author: Special Correspondent
text: The Madras High Court Bench here on Monday posted to March 7 for final hearing the appeals filed by the convicts in the Kumbakonam fire tragedy case related to the death of 94 children when a fire broke out in their school on July 14, 2004. A Division Bench of Justices A. Selvam and G. Chockalingam said on Monday that it would take up the appeals itself for final hearing after advocate N. Mohideen Basha, representing the school’s correspondent and his wife, pressed for suspension of sentences imposed on them.
title: Kumbakonam fire: hearing on March 7
